DataElement.preferredName: Substance Administration Schedule Study Activity Status Date and Time ISO21090.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity of applying, introducing or otherwise giving medications or other substances to a subject or experimental unit that is anticipated to occur at some time in the future. EXAMPLE(S): Administration of methotrexate as part of chemotherapy. The date (and time) on which the status is assigned to the activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Substance Administration Schedule Study Activity Status Date and Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An ordered list of times at which things are planned to occur.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._A condition or state at a particular time.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains TS so that it's precision can not be more precise than seconds.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
